text: @realDonaldTrump New White House Coronavirus model projects 134,000 deaths in US, nearly double its last estimate. Thanks Donald for asking protesters to go out and request their liberation. Thanks to you your Monday predictions have now doubled. Good job.....that was sarcasm!
